pullRequest.body:
Define the Artin braid group on infinitely many strands. Includes a toGroup function which defines a function out of the braid group to any other group (given a function which satisfies the braid relations)

(more to come in this file; next up: Artin braid groups on finitely many strands)

---

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ BraidGroupInf`
`+ BraidGroupInf.braid`
`+ BraidGroupInf.comm`
`+ braid_rels_inf`
`+ instance : Group BraidGroupInf := by`
`+ toGroup`
`+ toGroup.of`
`+ toGroup.unique`
`+ σi`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:

```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>
@hannahfechtner You closed some of the conversations, but it seems the code didn't change. Did you forget to push?

> @hannahfechtner You closed some of the conversations, but it seems the code didn't change. Did you forget to push?

indeed. clearly I shouldn't be fussing with github past my bedtime!
Please move this to `## TODO` for now.

Please add this when they arrive.
```suggestion
```
will do! (trying to break things down into little pieces, and this is the downside)

In other files, this group will have the name `BraidGroup.BraidGroupInf`. Is that your intention? I think we should have `BraidGroupInf` and `BraidGroup` as two namespaces. And so this definition should live in the root namespace.
Please use the docstring to state the relations in a notation that is maybe a bit easier to read than the Lean notation with all the `.of`s.

```suggestion
* `BraidGroup n` is the braid group on n+1 strands (thus n generators)
```

```suggestion
theorem braid {i j : ℕ} (h : 1 = Nat.dist i j) : σ i * σ j * σ i = σ j * σ i * σ j := by
```
I would expect `h : Nat.dist i j = 1`. That direction reads a bit more natural. And you could use `h.symm` in the proof. But I'll leave that choice up to you.

Because of the namespace, you now get duplication in the names
```suggestion
private theorem comm {i j : ℕ} (h : 2 ≤ Nat.dist i j) : σ i * σ j = σ j * σ i := by
```

```suggestion
theorem toGroup_σ (h : ∀ r ∈ braid_rels_inf, FreeGroup.lift f r = 1) {x : ℕ} :
```
Alternatively, consider renaming `σ` to `of`. But again, I don't have a strong opinion there.

pullRequest.title: feat : define Artin braid groups
